data.message: If only more of us could take action like, I'm sure God put the seed in most people's heart to help, they just need to nurture these seeds like"Rex Hohlbein of Homeless in Seattle" did! #Giving Tuesday!

replies.message: My brother was homeless. And died October 6, 2014 from a heart attack. I didn't even know he was homeless. He died on my birthday, so I have made that day and many more days special. By giving out a backpack of food. Some personal items. Socks, knit hats, knit scarf, blankets. This Christmas. I'm getting tarps to add to each package.
When it happens to someone that you know, it changes everything about how you feel about it.
More than just could just do what else do we do With our time.
Trude Petersen Thank you for sharing a bit of your story!
Thank you Jere for the kind words!
